Eat freely (take):
Raisin, Raisins, Dried apricot, Fig
#Increases: Ruminococcus
#Decreases: Prevotella
Reduce eating:
Almond, Walnut, Cashews, Dates
#Increases: Lactobacillus
#Decreases: Anaerostipes

Eat freely (take):
Apple, Grapes, Kiwi Fruit Powder, Pear, Guava, Orange, Goose berry, Muskmelon
#Increases: Ruminococcus, Dorea
Reduce eating:
Banana, Berries, Berries’ polyphenols, Pomegranate, Persimmons, Custard apple, Mango ripe, Jackfruit
#Increases: Lactobacillus

Eat freely (take):
Wheat, Ragi, Quinoa, Horse gram, Lentils, Masoor dal
#Increases: Anaerostipes, Ruminococcus, Bifidobacterium
Reduce eating:
Brown rice, Jowar, Moong, Wheat Bran, Refined flour, Corn flour, Chickpea, Kidney beans, Toor dal
#Increases: Lactobacillus, Prevotella, Enterococcus
#Decreases: Anaerostipes

Eat freely (take):
Chicory, Chokeberry, Conventional soy milk (26.5% β-conglycinin/38.7% glycinin), Orange Juice, Chamomile tea, Foxnuts, Soya chunks
#Increases: Anaerostipes
#Decreases: Lactobacillus
Reduce eating:
Black Tea, Dealcoholized red wine, Fermented soy milk, Green Tea, Guar gum, Honey, Kefir, Oolong Tea, Red wine, Red wine polyphenols, Regular soy milk, Soy isoflavones, Egg, Fish , Chicken, Mutton, Beef, Pork, White sugar, Jaggery, Tofu, Paneer, Coconut milk, Almond milk, Oats milk, Tea, Coffee, Skim milk, Curd, Yoghurt
#Increases: Lactobacillus, Enterococcus, Fusicatenibacter, Prevotella
#Decreases: Lactobacillus

Eat freely (take):
Sesame seeds, Fenugreek seeds, Cumin seeds
#Nutritional Balance

Reduce eating:
Curcumin, Red Chili powder, Garam masala
#Increases: Enterococcus, Citrobacter
#Decreases: Ruminococcus

Eat freely (take):
Leek, Tomato, Onion, Beans, Spinach, Drumstick, Asparagus, Okra, Bottle gourd, Brinjal
#Increases: Anaerostipes, Ruminococcus, Bifidobacterium
Reduce eating:
Carrot, mango peel and paste, cooked & cooled Potato, Sweet potato, Unripe banana, Broccoli, Beetroot, Cauliflower, Pumpkin
#Decreases: Ruminococcus, Fusicanternibacter
